Related Character(s): 䮻
Связанный символ (и): 䮻

禂字的基本解释

禂
dǎo
为牲畜肥壮而祭祷：“禂牲禂马。”

禂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dǎo］
［《廣韻》都晧切，上晧，端。］
祷告。古代用于祈求马匹等牲口肥健。

禂字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【示字部】　禂； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页844第11
【唐韻】都皓切【集韻】【韻會】覩老切，?音倒。與禱通。【說文】禱牲馬祭也。【周禮·春官】甸祝禂牲禂馬，皆掌其祝號。【註】杜子春云：禂，禱也。爲馬禱無疾，爲田禱多獲禽牲。【詩·小雅】旣伯旣禱。【疏】伯，馬祖，天駟房星之神，爲田而禱馬祖，求馬强健。○按杜說《詩》疏禂牲禂馬，總是馬祭一事。鄭康成註《周禮》，不取杜說，謂禂讀如伏誅之誅，今侏大字也。爲牲祭求肥充，爲馬祭求肥健，據此則禂止釋肥大，不切禱意，而禂牲禂馬爲兩事矣，與杜說迥不同。《集韻》《韻會》主鄭說，音追輸切，而又止釋云爲牲祭求肥充，反脫却祭馬一事，不知何解。　又【集韻】刀號切，音到。義同。或作䮻?。

禂字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
禂字的起名意思

暂无。

禂
Basic explanation of words
禂
dǎo
Sacrifice and pray for the fat and sturdy livestock: "Horse animals and horses."
禂
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dǎo］
["Guangyun" are all cut, upper and end. ]
prayer. In ancient times, it was used to pray for the health of horses and other livestock.
禂
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Shizi Department] 　禂; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 844 No. 11
[Tang Yun] Du Haoqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Han Laoqie, the sound is down. Connect with prayer. [Said the text] also pray for the sacrifice of animals and horses. 【Zhou Li·Chunguan】Dianxianxianxianxianxian, all hold their greetings. [Note] Du Zichunyun: Yu, pray too. Pray for horses without disease, pray for fields to get more animals. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Pray for the boy. [Shu] Bo, Mazu, the god of the sky, the house and the stars, pray for Mazu for the field, and ask for a strong horse. ○According to Du said, "The Poetry" is always a matter of horse sacrifice. Zheng Kangcheng's annotation of "Zhou Li" does not take Du's theory, saying that the reading of Zhu is like the punish of Fu Zhu, and now the big characters are also dwarfed. Seeking fertility for animal sacrifices and fertility for horse sacrifices. According to this, the fatness is relieved and there is no prayer. However, the sacrifices and the horses are two things, which are very different from what Du said. The master of "Jiyun" and "Yunhui" Zheng said that the sound is chasing and losing, but Shiyun is not asking for fat and filling for the sacrifice of the animal.　[Jiyun] The knife number cuts, the sound arrives. The same meaning. Or as an associate?.
